mapper.insert: insert into review (review_id, restaurant_id, username, review_content, review_img, write_date) values (#{reviewId}, #{restaurantId}, #{username}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewImg}, now())
mapper.select: select review_id as reviewId, restaurant_id as restaurantId, menu_id as menuId, username, review_content as reviewContent, review_img as reviewImg, star, write_date from review where restaurant_id=#{restaurantId} order by review_id asc
select count(*) from review where restaurant_id=#{restaurantId}
select count(*) from review where menu_id=#{menuId}
